attributes.action: Save one of cardiff's last remaining film photography course and darkroom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cardiff council are to close a darkroom at Howardian Adult Education Centre which is used by several photography courses. This is one of the last places in Wales where film photography is taught. It's loss will mean tutors losing jobs and students missing out.  A  huge loss for the arts community in Cardiff and society as a whole.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Welsh Assembly.This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
